mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.version , a.is_sell , a.create_time , a.price , a.backtest , a.options , a.description , b.name , b.user_id , ifnull(c.sell_count, 0) as sell_count FROM strategy_deploy a JOIN strategy b on a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT aa.id , aa.version , count(aa.user_id) as sell_count FROM strategy_sell_history aa GROUP BY aa.id, aa.version ) c on a.id = c.id and a.version = c.version WHERE a.is_sell = true
